mapper.select: SELECT @a:=@a+1 serial_number , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS timestamp , STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS regdate , a.package_name , a.contents , a.latitude , a.longitude , a.source , a.is_visited FROM lv1_os_and_geodata a, (SELECT @a:= 0) AS sn WHERE a.case_id = #{case_id} ORDER BY regdate desc
